text:
Looks like things like when using XML format:
  <a href="%= expression %"/>
doesn't actually get interpreted by Jasper...
creator: pier@betaversion.org
kin-man.chung@sun.com
text:
According to the spec, request-time expressions are only allowed in custom tags,
and some standard actions, but not in template text (including unrecognized
tags). This might be fixed in JSP1.3, stay tuned.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 5785 ***
